body_html:
You can run bazel test //tensorflow/... to run every test, although that will be unnecessary since it will test a lot of code you haven't touched at all. bazel test //tensorflow/python/... is plenty.

When you submit a PR, we will have Jenkins test it, and this will build and test the code in several different environments.
body_text:
You can run bazel test //tensorflow/... to run every test, although that will be unnecessary since it will test a lot of code you haven't touched at all. bazel test //tensorflow/python/... is plenty.
When you submit a PR, we will have Jenkins test it, and this will build and test the code in several different environments.
body:
You can run bazel test //tensorflow/... to run every test, although that will be unnecessary since it will test a lot of code you haven't touched at all. bazel test //tensorflow/python/... is plenty.

When you submit a PR, we will have Jenkins test it, and this will build and test the code in several different environments.
